greeting.text: Welcome to Grid-Town! I'm Sam, your friendly greeter. What would you like to know?

about-town.text: Grid-Town is a vibrant community hub! Central Park is our heart, surrounded by the office and arcade to the east, meeting rooms to the left, the lounge cafe below, and the plaza for gatherings!

directions.text: Head through Central Park to reach everywhere! The office and arcade are to the east. Meeting rooms are on the left side. The lounge cafe is down south - Jamie makes great coffee! And don't miss the plaza fountain!
